body:
Hey Guys!
Can somebody please tell me how I can make a nebula map for the server?
I posted on the recent discussions forum about a month ago asking how and also asking how to become a staff member, I got several reply's saying "there will be applications in 2 weeks". Now, after 2 weeks, can I sign up or what?
Can anybody help me?

title: Staff applications? Are they up yet?

replies.body: The staff applications are opening quite soon! :) When they open a tab titled staff applications shall open up! :D
